message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $140.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product.
